list.description: Update whether the overhang is visible or not

list.title: module:ServerDiscoveryTask.init
list.description: Task used to discover jellyfin servers on the local network

list.title: module:SetServerScreen.OnScreenShown
list.description: JFScreen hook called when the screen is displayed by the screen manager

list.title: module:ShowScenes.CreateAlbumView
list.description: Shows details on selected album. Description text, image, and list of available songs

list.title: module:ShowScenes.CreateArtistView
list.description: Shows details on selected artist. Bio, image, and list of available albums

list.title: module:ShowScenes.CreatePlaylistView
list.description: Shows details on selected playlist. Description text, image, and list of available items

list.title: module:ShowScenes.SendPerformanceBeacon
list.description: Roku Performance monitoring

list.title: module:ShowScenes.playbackOptionDialog
list.description: Opens dialog asking user if they want to resume video or start playback over only on the home screen

list.title: module:Subtitles.availSubtitleTrackIdx
list.description: Roku translates the info provided in subtitleTracks into availableSubtitleTracks Including ignoring tracks, if they are not understood, thus making indexing unpredictable. This function translates between our internel selected subtitle index and the corresponding index in availableSubtitleTracks.

list.title: module:Subtitles.defaultSubtitleTrack
list.description: Identify the default subtitle track if "requires_text" is true, only return a track if it is textual This allows forcing text subs, since roku requires transcoding of non-text subs returns the server-side track index for the appriate subtitle

list.title: module:Subtitles.defaultSubtitleTrackFromVid
list.description: Identify the default subtitle track for a given video id returns the server-side track index for the appriate subtitle

list.title: module:Subtitles.getSubtitleSelIdxFromSubIdx
list.description: The subtitle index on the server differs from the index we track locally This function converts the former into the latter

list.title: module:Subtitles.selectSubtitleTrackDialog
list.description: Present Dialog to user to select subtitle track

list.title: module:Subtitles.setupSubtitle
list.description: Given a set of subtitles, and a subtitle index (the index on the server, not in the list provided) this will set all relevant settings for roku (mainly closed captions) and return the index of the subtitle track specified, but indexed based on the provided list of subtitles

list.title: module:Subtitles.sortSubtitles
list.description: Checks available subtitle tracks and puts subtitles in forced, default, and non-default/forced but preferred language at the top

list.title: module:TVEpisodeRowWithOptions.SetUpAudioOptions
list.description: List of audio tracks to choose from

list.title: module:TVEpisodeRowWithOptions.SetUpVideoOptions
list.description: List of video versions to choose from

list.description: Updates the visibility of the Extras button based on if this season has any extra features

list.title: module:TVListDetails.DisplayVideoAvailable
list.description: Adds "+N" (e.g. +1) if there is more than one video version to choose from

list.title: module:TVListDetails.SetupAudioDisplay

list.description: Switch menu shown when button focus changes

list.description: sets the certificate authority by file path on the passed node

list.title: module:conditional.printRegistry
list.description: Print out all of the registry contents to the debug log

list.title: module:config.GetConfigTree
list.description: Read config tree from json config file and return

list.description: Return all data found inside a registry section

list.description: Recursivly search the config tree for entry with settingname equal to key

list.description: Returns an array of saved users from the registry that belong to the active server

list.description: User registry accessors for the currently active user

list.description: Generic registry accessors

list.title: module:deviceCapabilities.getDeviceCapabilities
list.description: Returns the Device Capabilities for Roku. Also prints out the device profile for debugging

list.title: module:deviceCapabilities.printDeviceProfile
list.description: Print out the deviceProfile for debugging

list.title: module:deviceCapabilities.removeDecimals
list.description: Remove all decimals from a string

list.title: module:deviceCapabilities.setPreferredCodec
list.description: Takes and returns a comma delimited string of codecs. Moves the preferred codec to the front of the string

list.title: module:deviceCapabilities.updateProfileArray
list.description: Recieves and returns an assArray of supported profiles and levels for each video codec

list.title: module:globals.SaveAppToGlobal
list.description: Save information from roAppInfo to m.global.app

list.title: module:globals.SaveDeviceToGlobal
list.description: Save information from roDeviceInfo to m.global.device

list.title: module:globals.setConstants
list.description: Set global constants

list.title: module:migrations.runGlobalMigrations
list.description: Run all necessary registry mirations on the "global" Jellyfin registry section

list.title: module:misc.arrayHasValue
list.description: Check if a specific value is inside of an array

list.title: module:misc.createLogoPoster
list.description: Create and return a Jellyfin logo poster node

list.title: module:misc.createSeperator
list.description: Create and return a rectangle node used as a seperator in the overhang

list.title: module:misc.formatTime
list.description: Format time as 12 or 24 hour format based on system clock setting

list.title: module:misc.getMinutes
list.description: Converts ticks to minutes

list.title: module:misc.get_dialog_result
list.description: Returns the item selected or -1 on backpress or other unhandled closure of dialog.

list.title: module:misc.inArray
list.description: Search string array for search value. Return if it's found

list.title: module:misc.inferServerUrl
list.description: take an incomplete url string and use it to make educated guesses about the complete url. then tests these guesses to see if it can find a jf server returns the url of the server it found, or an empty string

list.title: module:misc.isAllValid
list.description: Returns whether or not all items in passed array are valid

list.title: module:misc.isChainValid
list.description: isChainValid: Returns whether or not all the properties in the passed property chain are valid. Stops evaluating at first found false value

list.title: module:misc.isJellyfinServer
list.description: accepts the raw json string of /system/info/public and returns a boolean indicating if ProductName is "Jellyfin Server"

list.title: module:misc.isLocalhost
list.description: Returns true if the string is a loopback, such as 'localhost' or '127.0.0.1'

list.title: module:misc.isValid
list.description: Returns whether or not passed value is valid

list.title: module:misc.isValidAndNotEmpty
list.description: Returns whether or not passed value is valid and not empty Accepts a string, or any countable type (arrays and lists)

list.title: module:misc.parseUrl
list.description: Returns an array from a url = [ url, proto, host, port, subdir+params ] If port or subdir are not found, an empty string will be added to the array Proto must be declared or array will be empty

list.title: module:misc.roundNumber
list.description: Rounds number to nearest integer

list.title: module:misc.shuffleArray
list.description: Takes an array of data, shuffles the order, then returns the array uses the Fisher-Yates shuffling algorithm

list.title: module:misc.startLoadingSpinner
list.description: startLoadingSpinner: Start a loading spinner and attach it to the main JFScene. Displays an invisible ProgressDialog node by default to disable keypresses while loading.

list.title: module:misc.toBoolean
list.description: convert value to boolean and return value

list.title: module:misc.urlCandidates
list.description: this is the "educated guess" logic for inferServerUrl that generates a list of complete url's as candidates for the tests in inferServerUrl. takes an incomplete url as an arg and returns a list of extrapolated full urls.

list.title: module:misc.versionChecker
list.description: Returns whether or not a version number (e.g. 10.7.7) is greater or equal to some minimum version allowed (e.g. 10.8.0)

list.title: module:quickplay.album
list.description: A music album. Play the entire album starting with track 1.

list.description: A music artist. Shuffle play all songs by artist.

list.description: A single audio file.

list.description: A boxset. Play all items inside.

list.description: Quick Play A Playlist. Play the first unwatched episode. If none, play the whole season starting with episode 1.

list.description: Quick Play A Live Program

list.title: module:quickplay.pushToQueue
list.description: Takes an array of items and adds to global queue. Also shuffles the playlist if asked

list.description: A TV Show Season. Play the first unwatched episode. If none, play the whole season starting with episode 1.

list.description: A TV Show Series. Play the first unwatched episode. If none, shuffle play the whole series.

list.description: A container with some kind of videos inside of it

list.description: Update the Program Details with full information
